title: Evolution Bakery and Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The owners of Up Country Bakery and Cafe in Captain Cook moved to this location in Dec 2013. Now the bakery cafe, renewed, is in the Coconut Grove Marketplace. Shares a location with Get Sum Pizza. Offers breakfast menu until 11:30am which includes vegan pancakes and breakfast sandwiches. After that, juices, coffee, smoothies and pastry items available. Has vegan cheese and vegan alternatives.
